readme:
# Cold Syntax

A dark, cool-blue syntax theme for the [Atom](https://atom.io/) text editor.
Designed for use with the [cold-ui](https://atom.io/themes/cold-ui) theme to maximize editor space.

* Python
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/woznia62/cold-syntax/master/cold-syntax_python.png)

* C++
![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/woznia62/cold-syntax/master/cold-syntax_cpp.png)


## Install:

- From the command line ...

```bash
$ apm install cold-syntax
```


- Alternatively, open Atom Preferences, select Themes > Search for cold-syntax, then Install.

  Activate the theme by selecting the Themes section of Preferences.

* Syntax looks best with Adobe Source Code Pro. The font package is included with the [cold-ui](https://atom.io/themes/cold-ui) theme.
